alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 2:41PM MST until February 03 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Kiowa County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County
